entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1 except plus 5 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1 except plus 5 inland. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. POP 60%
